description:
✂  Tools & Supplies I Recommend: https://goo.gl/Y7KKhY
$  Join the "Fellowship" on Patreon: https://goo.gl/ZZ4vBf

This episode I test out a nifty new tool from Green Stuff World, the Dungeon Plunger Cutters! A way to make excellent looking dungeon tiles out of Sculpey, Fimor, or other polymer clay. 

DUNGEON PLUNGER CUTTERS BY GREEN STUFF WORLD: https://goo.gl/sdscKw

USE PROMO CODE FOR %5 DISCOUNT on your Green Stuff World order: “BMCWINTER2019” (expires 31/03/2019)

BUY Polymer Clay:

Super Sculpey (USA): http://amzn.to/2BDjaWL
Super Sculpey (Canada): http://amzn.to/2BBc59j

Fimo Soft (USA): http://amzn.to/2CxahLy
Fimo Soft (Canada): http://amzn.to/2Fc48XS

BUY Chipboard (The exact one used in this video)

USA: http://amzn.to/2Fr9C10
Canada: http://amzn.to/2ooZazN

(As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases)

➳  http://www.blackmagiccraft.ca

➳ Facebook: https://goo.gl/hvNgQL

➳ Join the Tabletop Crafters Guild: https://goo.gl/RMMqoh

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

title: Dungeon Tile Plunger Cutters by Green Stuff World (Black Magic Craft Episode 077)
